duties_responsibilities.duty: Support front office and perform ESG-related due diligence and reviews, including reputational risk review and stakeholder coordination.
Assist in drafting, enhancing, and obtaining stakeholder feedback on ESG-related policies and procedures.
Develop training materials and communication content on process implementation and other ESG topics.
Prepare analysis and reporting for senior management, detailing metrics and trends.
Stay current on ESG trends and industry developments, and share knowledge with stakeholders.
Assist with other responsibilities and tasks as identified.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required, Master’s degree a plus
